IX.ii.2.A.3.c
.
Considering Retroactive Eligibility
If eligibility for pension is established from a date subsequent to the date of the claim, consider whether retroactive eligibility may be established under
38 CFR 3.321(b)(2)
.
If retroactive eligibility under
38 CFR 3.321(b)(2)
is not in order, provide an explanation in the
Reasons for Decision
section of the rating decision.
